snippet.title: The Hardest Dungeon - Official Trailer (Early Access)
snippet.description:
Thank you for watching the official trailer for "The Hardest Dungeon". "The Hardest Dungeon" is an upcoming roguelite role playing game, with strong focus on team management and survival.
Player will control a team of heroes to venture the Dungeon of Kalok. Your target is to collect "The Deck of Mulark", the first ever Tarot Deck created by your ancestors with immense power that can alter the world.
